sentences.en: An engaged woman is always more agreeable than a disengaged.
sentences.cn: 订了婚的女子往往比没订婚的更可爱.

sentences.en: John gently disengaged himself from his sister's tearful embrace.
sentences.cn: 约翰轻轻推开抱着他哭泣的妹妹。
我军和敌军脱离了接触.

sentences.en: She disengaged her hand from that of the child.
sentences.cn: 她把手从孩子手里抽出来.

sentences.en: She disengaged her hand from that of the sleeping child.
sentences.cn: 她把手从睡着的孩子的手中抽出来.

sentences.en: She disengaged the film advance mechanism on the camera.
sentences.cn: 她松开了照相机上的送片装置。

sentences.en: She gently disengaged herself from her sleeping son.
sentences.cn: 她轻轻地放下怀中熟睡的儿子。

sentences.en: teenagers who are depressed or disengaged from their families
sentences.cn: 感到沮丧或与家人有隔阂的青少年

sentences.en: The car is in / out of gear , ie has the gears engaged / disengaged.
The enemy warships were disengaged from the battle after suffering heavy casualties.
sentences.cn: 在遭受惨重伤亡后,敌舰退出了海战.

sentences.en: The film has the feel of a man curiously disengaged from his material.
sentences.cn: 这部电影给人一种创作者与他的素材反常地保持疏离的感觉。

sentences.en: The mother gently disengaged her hand from that of the sleeping child.
sentences.cn: 母亲轻轻地把手从睡着的孩子手中抽出来.

sentences.en: This gentleman declared himself quite disengaged, and came forth from his retreat.
sentences.cn: 这位绅士宣称他没事了, 就从隐蔽的地方走了出来.

words.tran_cn: 空闲的；自由的；已脱离的

trans.tran_cn: 自由的，闲散的，未约束的，脱离的
分开( disengage的过去式和过去分词 )，解开，释放，使（部队）脱离战斗
